highlighted_context: This is a free scheme, where **all is asked** of schools is for them to cover the cost of packaging and posting the materials on return (usually around £13) and to be responsible for any instruments that are borrowed.
reasoning: The phrasing 'all is asked' is grammatically acceptable but slightly awkward; 'all that is asked' or 'what is asked' would improve flow and clarity.

highlighted_context: Further details can be found here: MetLink - [Royal Meteorological Society Borrow an **Instrument –**](https://www.metlink.org/fieldwork-resource/instruments-and-fieldwork/)
